alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:58AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pemiscot, northwestern Obion and northeastern Lake Counties through 415 AM CST... At 358 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tiptonville, or near Reelfoot Lake State Park, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Clayton, Woodland Mills, Samburg, Spout Springs, Walnut Log, Wright, Cronanville, Grays Camp, Sunkist Beach, Cates, Bessie, Proctor City, New Markham, Crystal, Stewart and Reelfoot National Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
